titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a fee on certain products imported into the United State based on the pollution intensity associated with the production of such products, and for other purposes.

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a fee on certain products imported into the United State based on the pollution intensity associated with the production of such products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
